book.synopsis:
Read Shakespeare’s plays in all their brilliance—and understand what every word means!

Don’t be intimidated by Shakespeare! These popular guides make the Bard’s plays accessible and enjoyable.

Each No Fear guide contains: The complete text of the original play A line-by-line translation that puts the words into everyday language A complete list of characters, with descriptions Plenty of helpful commentary
book.title_long: As You Like It (No Fear Shakespeare) (Volume 13)
book.dimensions: Height: 5.25 Inches, Length: 7.5 Inches, Weight: 0.55997414548 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
